name: Buddy
description: Friendly and playful, loves to fetch.

name: Rocky
description: Energetic and loyal, great for outdoor activities.

name: Mittens
description: Gentle and enjoys cuddling, has a luxurious coat.

name: Charlie
description: Loves water and long walks, great family dog.

name: Luna
description: Large and sociable, known for tufted ears and bushy tail.

name: Max
description: Intelligent and protective, excellent guard dog.

name: Oreo
description: Playful and curious, black and white coat.

name: Daisy
description: Friendly and good with kids, known for its keen sense of smell.

name: Milo
description: Relaxed and affectionate, loves being held like a baby.
